snippet.title: We Were Here - Together | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We Were Here… Together!
Total Mayhem Games announces the next standalone entry in their We Were Here series of intriguing communication-centered co-op puzzle games. We Were Here Together is expected to be released early next year. 

Wishlist We Were Here Together now on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/865360 

After braving the icy wastes to reach Castle Rock, being trapped inside isn’t the worst of it. After all, the jester is locked up in there with you.

Separated from your partner, you’ll have to rely on your wits, a walkie-talkie, and the other player being on the same wavelength. Communication is everything if you want to escape the dark citadel.
 

Official Website: http://www.totalmayhemgames.com/
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/WeWereHereGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wewereheregame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/totalmayhemgames/
Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/WWHO

----------------------------------------
Created by Total Mayhem Games

Directed by:
Ruud Renting

Art Direction by:
Victor van den Beld

Technical Direction by: 
Christian de Kool

Music:
Sigmund Krähe - Death of Maliphant

Painted Artwork by:
Gracia Artigas

Animated by:
Frian Lit

Voice Acting by:
Ruud Renting

Texture Artist:
Benjamin van Hemert

Sound Design: 
Leon van der Stel

Voice Over Author: 
Gerben Grave

Public Relations & Press Contact:
Lucia de Visser
